Tools Directory

Helpful utilities to make everyday tasks easier. All tools are designed with seniors in mind — clear language, large controls, and high contrast. Tools listed here are planned for launch and are currently marked as “Coming Soon.”

List of tools

  • Tip Calculator

    Quickly calculate tip amounts and total bill so you don’t have to do the math.

    Coming Soon

  • Unit Converter

    Convert common units like inches to centimeters or pounds to kilograms.

    Coming Soon

  • Password Generator

    Create a strong, easy-to-copy password for your accounts.

    Coming Soon

  • QR Code Generator

    Turn a web link or short text into a QR code you can save or share.

    Coming Soon

  • Word Counter

    Count words and estimate reading time for a piece of text.

    Coming Soon

  • Character Counter

    See how many characters are in your message or post.

    Coming Soon

  • Color Picker

    Pick a color and get the hex code to use in designs or emails.

    Coming Soon

  • BMI Calculator

    Calculate body mass index (BMI) from simple height and weight inputs.

    Coming Soon

  • Loan Calculator

    Estimate monthly payments for a loan using amount, term, and interest.

    Coming Soon

  • Time / Date Calculator

    Add, subtract, or compare dates and times for planning events.

    Coming Soon

Want a tool sooner? Email support@novaqy.com with your suggestion and we’ll prioritize based on demand.
